casebody.data:
Laurie J. CARPENTER, Appellant, v. ERIE RAILROAD COMPANY, Appellee. No. 30, Docket 21035. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit Oct. 21, 1948. Laurie J. Carpenter, pro se. Edward J. McGratty, Jr., and Davis, Polk, Wardell, Sunderland & Kiendl, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, Chief Judge, and SWAN and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the authority of Michalek v. United States Gypsum Company, 2 Cir., 76 F.2d 115, and Moore v. Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railroad, 187 Okl. 534, 104 P.2d 236.
